name: iooborel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), c2)
-| wss(c3, c2)
-| wcel(co(c0, cioo, c1), c3)

body.origin:
|- wss(c3, c2)
-| wcel(c3, ctop)
-| wi(wcel(c3, ctop), wss(c3, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ c3 ⊆ c2
⊣ c3 ∈ Top
⊣ (c3 ∈ Top → c3 ⊆ c2)
